title: Practical Placeholders
text: lipsum_loripsum() function probably best go-place holder text API package, provides control output far contents concerned. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Tanta vis admonitionis inest locis; Quid ergo? Quod equidem non reprehendo; Bork Sed fortuna fortis; Sed plane dicit quod intellegit. Quibusnam praeteritis? Ita nemo beato beatior. Quod equidem non reprehendo; Hoc mihi cum tuo fratre convenit. Tu vero, inquam, ducas licet, si sequetur; Plane idem, inquit, et maxima quidem, qua fieri nulla maior potest. Homines optimi non intellegunt totam rationem everti, si ita res se habeat. Item de contrariis, quibus ad genera formasque generum venerunt. Cui Tubuli nomen odio non est? Bestiarum vero nullum iudicium puto. Frater et T. Nam ante Aristippus, et ille melius. Recte dicis; Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Negat esse eam, inquit, propter se expetendam. Non igitur de improbo, sed de callido improbo quaerimus, qualis Q. Bork Utrum igitur tibi litteram videor totas paginas commovere? Paria sunt igitur. Nec enim ignoras istud honestum non summum modo, sed etiam, ut tu vis, solum bonum videri. Cur iustitia laudatur? Non enim, si malum est dolor, carere eo malo satis est ad bene vivendum. Immo alio genere; Quod cum ille dixisset et satis disputatum videretur, oppidum ad Pomponium perreximus omnes. Inquit, cum ego te hac nova lege videam eodem die accusatori responderet tribus horis perorare, hac causa tempus dilaturum putas?
code: example_loripsum <-   lipsum_loripsum(     n = 3L,     length = "short",     decorate = TRUE, # adds italics, bold, etc.     link = TRUE, # adds some links     ul = TRUE, # adds an unordered list (bullets)     ol = TRUE, # adds an ordererd list (numbers)     dl = TRUE, # adds a description list (headers and contents)     bq = TRUE, # adds a blockquote     code = TRUE, # adds code samples     headers = FALSE, # adds headers - may mess with RMarkdown/Quarto!     allcaps = FALSE, # capitalises the whole output     prude = TRUE # see above note   ) Illa autem, morbum, egestatem, dolorem, non appello m a l a, sed, si libet, r e i e c t a n e a.  Nam et complectitur verbis, quod vult, et dicit plane, quod intellegam;

code: example_seazon <-   lipsum_seazon(     # features     latin = TRUE,     start_with_lorem = TRUE,     use_periods = TRUE,     use_sentence_case = TRUE,     p = TRUE,     use_double_spaces = FALSE,     # refine latin = FALSE     random_numbers = FALSE,     random_latin = TRUE,     # sentence structure     min_letters = 2L,     max_letters = 9L,     min_words = 45L,     max_words = 85L,     min_paras = 3L,     max_paras = 4L   )

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: lipsum_literature() function really “silly” whimsical ipsum generators; grabs excerpts public domain classic literature like Sherlock Holmes, Dracula, . Users can opt paragraph list tags, don’t expect complicated elements . went part work, another half hour found name address Mrs. Westenra’s solicitor written . poor lady’s papers order; explicit directions regarding place burial given. hardly sealed letter, , surprise, Van Helsing walked room, saying:– “Can help , friend John? free, may, service .” “got looked ?” asked, replied:–
code: example_lit <-   lipsum_literature(     n = 3L,     tag = "p", # add p tags     source = "dracula"   ) # take from dracula

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: lipsum_actor() gives little control output. However, output pretty fun - gives paragraphs impersonating famous actor pop culture icon. Robin Williams think know first thing hard life , feel, , read Oliver Twist? encapsulate ? Personally… don’t give shit , know , can’t learn anything , can’t read fuckin’ book. Unless want talk , . ’m fascinated. ’m . don’t want sport? ’re terrified might say. move, chief. rescue depths hell. wouldn’t know ’s like angel, love , forever, anything, cancer. wouldn’t know sleeping sitting hospital room two months, holding hand, doctors see eyes, terms “visiting hours” don’t apply . don’t know real loss, ’cause occurs ’ve loved something love . doubt ’ve ever dared love anybody much. look … don’t see intelligent, confident man… see cocky, scared shitless kid. ’re genius . one denies . one possibly understand depths . presume know everything saw painting mine, ripped fucking life apart. ’re orphan right? Yep. Day game. sittin’ bar, waitin’ game start, walks girl. Oh, amazing game, though. know, bottom eighth, Carbo ties 6-6. went twelve. Bottom twelfth, stepped Carlton Fisk. Old Pudge. Steps plate, know, ’s got weird stance. Thought said day, painting. Stayed half night thinking . Something occurred … fell deep peaceful sleep, haven’t thought since. know occurred ? , ’m kiddin’ , . ’s ’m talkin’ right now girl saw bar twenty years ago always regretted going talking . don’t regret 18 years married Nancy. don’t regret six years give counseling got sick. don’t regret last years got really sick. sure hell don’t regret missin’ damn game. ’s regret.
code: example_dev <- lipsum_actor(n = 5L)

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: lipsum_bacon() lipsum_hipster() similar options identical simply (partly) replace random Latin lorem ipsum meat words hipster-y phrases, respectively. MEAT: Bacon ipsum dolor amet jerky beef alcatra, bacon turducken picanha tri-tip tenderloin leberkas cupim sausage andouille shankle boudin. Burgdoggen beef ribs rump bresaola fatback, jowl flank capicola ham hock meatball. Sausage jowl bresaola pork belly, sirloin shoulder bacon pastrami landjaeger meatloaf. Short loin brisket porchetta sirloin pork belly kielbasa pork beef hamburger pastrami leberkas venison pancetta pork loin. Sausage swine chicken, frankfurter pork ground round jerky porchetta short loin ball tip. HIPSTER: ’m baby trust fund wayfarers plaid ramps Brooklyn coloring book humblebrag, roof party church-key sartorial chillwave raw denim. Bicycle rights ugh asymmetrical umami craft beer PBR&B edison bulb tacos iPhone 3 wolf moon knausgaard +1 gochujang grailed. Hella godard direct trade semiotics fit woke +1 banh mi skateboard pork belly put bird . Meditation tonx keffiyeh freegan tote bag mixtape readymade. Portland unicorn sriracha tbh.
code: example_meat <- lipsum_bacon(   n_sentences = 5L,   type = "all-meat",   start_with_lorem = TRUE )  example_hipster <- lipsum_hipster(   n_sentences = 5L,   type = "hipster-centric",   start_with_lorem = TRUE )

Whimsical, playful generators impersonate celebrities, list names dinosaurs, use profanity, . perhaps appropriate personal projects!

title: Obtain meaty placeholder text using the Bacon Ipsum API — lipsum_bacon
text: n_paras Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. n_sentences Integer, optional. number sentences generate. Overrides n_paras. type Character. One "-meat" meat words , "meat--filler" meat mixed random lorem ipsum words. Defaults "-meat". start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, starts first paragraph 'Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet'. Defaults TRUE.

text: n Integer, optional. number paragraphs generate. default, NULL, generates one "page" text source. tag Character, optional. One "p" "li", renders paragraphs p li tags, respectively. source Character, optional. book take placeholder text. One adventures-sherlock-holmes, dr-jekyll--mr-hyde, dracula, evelina, life--samuel-johnson, picture--dorian-gray, pride--prejudice. default, NULL, chooses one random.

what: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum

text: Generates random, customisable placeholder text using Loripsum Web API.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
code: lipsum_loripsum(   n = 5L,   length = "short",   decorate = FALSE,   link = FALSE,   ul = FALSE,   ol = FALSE,   dl = FALSE,   bq = FALSE,   code = FALSE,   headers = FALSE,   allcaps = FALSE,   prude = FALSE,   plaintext = FALSE )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: https://loripsum.net/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: n Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. length Character. average length paragraph. Can "short", "medium", "long" "verylong". Defaults "short". decorate Logical. TRUE, bold, italic marked text. Defaults FALSE. link Logical. TRUE, adds links. Defaults FALSE. ul Logical. TRUE, adds unordered lists. Defaults FALSE. ol Logical. TRUE, adds numbered/ordered lists. Defaults FALSE. dl Logical. TRUE, adds description lists. Defaults FALSE. bq Logical. TRUE, adds blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. code Logical. TRUE, adds code samples. Defaults FALSE. headers Logical. TRUE, adds headers. Defaults FALSE. allcaps Logical. TRUE, uses CAPS. Defaults FALSE. prude Logical. TRUE, removes Latin words construed offensive English, like 'sex' 'homo'. Defaults FALSE. plaintext Logical. TRUE, returns plain text without HTML tags. Defaults FALSE.

what: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: Generates customisable placeholder text using Lorem Markdownum API, formatted markdown.

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
code: lipsum_markdown(   n = 5L,   no_headers = FALSE,   no_code = FALSE,   no_inline_markup = FALSE,   no_quotes = FALSE,   no_lists = FALSE,   no_external_links = FALSE,   no_wrapping = FALSE,   underline_headers = FALSE,   reference_links = FALSE,   underscore_em = FALSE,   underscore_strong = FALSE,   fenced_code_blocks = FALSE )

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: https://jaspervdj./lorem-markdownum/

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: n Integer. number "blocks" generate. Defaults 5. no_headers Logical. TRUE, removes headers. Defaults FALSE. no_code Logical. TRUE, removes code snippets. Defaults FALSE. no_inline_markup Logical. TRUE, removes inline markup. Defaults FALSE. no_quotes Logical. TRUE, removes blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. no_lists Logical. TRUE, removes lists. Defaults FALSE. no_external_links Logical. TRUE, replaces external links internal links. Defaults FALSE. no_wrapping Logical. TRUE, prevents text wrapping. Defaults FALSE. underline_headers Logical. TRUE, headers underlined. Defaults FALSE. reference_links Logical. TRUE, uses reference-style links. Defaults FALSE. underscore_em Logical. TRUE, styles  using underscores. Defaults FALSE. underscore_strong Logical. TRUE, styles  using double underscores. Defaults FALSE. fenced_code_blocks Logical. TRUE, fences code blocks back-ticks. Defaults FALSE.

code: lipsum_seazon(   latin = TRUE,   start_with_lorem = TRUE,   use_periods = TRUE,   use_sentence_case = TRUE,   p = TRUE,   use_double_spaces = FALSE,   random_numbers = FALSE,   random_latin = TRUE,   min_letters = 2L,   max_letters = 9L,   min_words = 45L,   max_words = 85L,   min_paras = 3L,   max_paras = 4L )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
text: http://www.seazon.org/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
text: latin Logical. TRUE, generates Latin text. Otherwise generates random text. Defaults TRUE. start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, begins text 'Lorem Ipsum'. Defaults TRUE. use_periods Logical. TRUE, uses periods. Defaults TRUE. use_sentence_case Logical. TRUE, begins sentence upper case character. Defaults TRUE. p Logical. TRUE, wraps text paragraph tags. Defaults TRUE. use_double_spaces Logical. TRUE, puts double spaces sentence. Defaults FALSE. random_numbers Logical. TRUE, adds random numbers 'latin = FALSE'. Defaults TRUE. random_latin Logical. TRUE, makes random text latin-like 'latin = FALSE'. Defaults TRUE. min_letters, max_letters Minimum/maximum numbers letters word, 'latin = FALSE'. min_words, max_words Minimum/maximum paragraph word count. min_paras, max_paras Minimum/maximum number paragraphs.#'

title: lipsum (development version)
text: Added 4 practical lorem ipsum generators. Added several whimsical lorem ipsum generators. Powered curl , relevant, jsonlite.
